name: Hyper Xor
description:
Game Description

Hyper Xor is an action platformer where it matters HOW you die.

Die to unlock New Abilities and Fight your way out of The Hyper Realm.

Key Features

  • Die to unlock Abilities: Flight, Laser Vision, Crouching and Spike resistance
  • Laser your destroyable environment
  • Explore the Hyper Realm

Controls

  • Movement + Flight: W, S, A, D (or Arrows)
  • L-Ctrl: Crouch
  • LMB: Laser Vision

If you're experiencing trouble while launching the game try running the "nomenu" version.
